31.movie_plot: In the waning days of World War II, the United States Navy cargo ship Reluctant and her crew are stationed in the "backwater" areas of the Pacific Ocean. Trouble ensues when the crew members are granted liberty.

68.movie_plot: Six unemployed steel workers form a male striptease act. The women cheer them on to go for "the full monty" - total nudity.

169.movie_plot: After his father's death, Gilbert has to care for his mentally disabled brother, Arnie, and his morbidly obese mother, which is suddenly challenged when love walks into his life.

155.movie_plot: When a sports agent has a moral epiphany and is fired for expressing it, he decides to put his new philosophy to the test as an independent agent with the only athlete who stays with him and his former secretary.

286.movie_plot: An amnesiac and a private eye find they might have a past life connection.

268.movie_plot: A "National Geographic" film crew is taken hostage by an insane hunter, who takes them along on his quest to capture the world's largest - and deadliest - snake.

74.movie_plot: A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.

121.movie_plot: An insomniac office worker, looking for a way to change his life, crosses paths with a devil-may-care soapmaker, forming an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

38.movie_plot: After a successful heist, Porter is shot by his wife and his best friend. They leave him there to die but when he recovers, he seeks revenge and wants his share of the money.

190.movie_plot: A secret agent is sent to Sydney, to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera".

232.movie_plot: A young woman who's reinvented herself as a New York socialite must return home to Alabama to obtain a divorce from her husband, after seven years of separation.

192.movie_plot: The true story of a newly appointed African-American coach and his high school team on their first season as a racially integrated unit.

47.movie_plot: A weatherman finds himself inexplicably living the same day over and over again.

279.movie_plot: When two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

33.movie_plot: A young boy with stunted growth is convinced that God has a great purpose for him.

254.movie_plot: A small-time conman has torn loyalties between his estranged mother and new girlfriend--both of whom are high-stakes grifters with their own angles to play.

264.movie_plot: A sexually repressed woman's husband is having an affair with her sister. The arrival of a visitor with a rather unusual fetish changes everything.

123.movie_plot: A middle-aged woman finds herself in the middle of a huge conflict that will either make her a profit or cost her life.

5.movie_plot: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

80.movie_plot: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son, John Connor, from a more advanced cyborg.

53.movie_plot: A young Shakespeare, out of ideas and short of cash, meets his ideal woman and is inspired to write one of his most famous plays.

128.movie_plot: "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

27.movie_plot: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

207.movie_plot: A man, having fallen in love with the wrong woman, is sent by the sultan himself on a diplomatic mission to a distant land as an ambassador. Stopping at a Viking village port to restock on supplies, he finds himself unwittingly embroiled on a quest to banish a mysterious threat in a distant Viking land.

187.movie_plot: Wallace is used by a criminal penguin in a robbery involving mechanical trousers.

102.movie_plot: A woman with a body writing fetish seeks to find a combined lover and calligrapher.

42.movie_plot: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

266.movie_plot: An immortal Scottish swordsman must confront the last of his immortal opponent, a murderously brutal barbarian who lusts for the fabled "Prize".

157.movie_plot: Spike Lee's take on the "Son of Sam" murders in New York City during the summer of 1977 centering on the residents of an Italian-American Northeast Bronx neighborhood who live in fear and distrust of one another.

200.movie_plot: An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.

175.movie_plot: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

67.movie_plot: At a 1962 college, Dean Vernon Wormer is determined to expel the entire Delta Tau Chi Fraternity, but those troublemakers have other plans for him.

59.movie_plot: A single mother and waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is assaulted in a robbery.

246.movie_plot: Nine noble families fight for control over the mythical lands of Westeros, while a forgotten race returns after being dormant for thousands of years.

94.movie_plot: A research chemist comes under personal and professional attack when he decides to appear in a "60 Minutes" expose on Big Tobacco.

65.movie_plot: Comedy about a widow's post-traumatic obsession with a soap star.

237.movie_plot: 48 hours of intersecting lives and crimes in Los Angeles.

111.movie_plot: A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from high school, even though his date with her back then was a complete disaster.

91.movie_plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

163.movie_plot: Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people.

143.movie_plot: A romance writer sets off to Colombia to ransom her kidnapped sister, and soon finds herself in the middle of a dangerous adventure.

11.movie_plot: Wallace falls for Wendolene, a wool shop owner, while Gromit is framed for the sheep rustling.

17.movie_plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

57.movie_plot: Two best friends set out on an adventure, but it soon turns around to a terrifying escape from being hunted by the police, as these two girls escape for the crimes they committed.

109.movie_plot: In suburban New Canaan, Connecticut, 1973, middle class families experimenting with casual sex and substance abuse find their lives beyond their control.

126.movie_name: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery (1997)
126.movie_plot: A 1960s hipster secret agent is brought out of cryofreeze to oppose his greatest enemy in the 1990s, where his social attitudes are glaringly out of place.

239.movie_plot: James Bond teams up with the lone survivor of a destroyed Russian research center to stop the hijacking of a nuclear space weapon by a fellow Agent formerly believed to be dead.

119.movie_plot: A high school teacher's personal life becomes complicated as he works with students during the school elections, particularly with an obsessive overachiever determined to become student body president.

8.movie_plot: Two 1990s teenage siblings find themselves in a 1950s sitcom where their influence begins to profoundly change that complacent world.

181.movie_plot: An epic mosaic of interrelated characters in search of love, forgiveness, and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.

270.movie_plot: A colorful array of characters compete at a national dog show.

82.movie_plot: The defiant leader Moses rises up against the Egyptian Pharaoh Ramses, setting 600,000 slaves on a monumental journey of escape from Egypt and its terrifying cycle of deadly plagues.

204.movie_plot: A simple, sheltered gardener becomes an unlikely trusted advisor to a powerful businessman and an insider in Washington politics.

284.movie_plot: Barbarella, an astronaut from the 41st century, sets out to find and stop the evil scientist Durand Durand, whose Positronic Ray threatens to bring evil back into the galaxy.

49.movie_plot: After the rebels are overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda. His friends accept shelter from a questionable ally as Darth Vader hunts them in a plan to capture Luke.

171.movie_plot: Rob, a record store owner and compulsive list maker, recounts his top five breakups, including the one in progress.

60.movie_plot: A young thief, seeking revenge for the death of his brother, is trained by the once great, but aged Zorro, who also pursues vengeance of his own.

223.movie_plot: Jake Blues, just out from prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and brother Elwood were raised.

92.movie_plot: As corruption grows in 1950s LA, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

153.movie_plot: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

26.movie_plot: An imprisoned IRA fighter is freed to help stop a brutal, seemingly "faceless" assassin from completing his next job.

18.movie_plot: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

122.movie_plot: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

100.movie_plot: Students suspect that their teachers are aliens after bizarre occurrences.

28.movie_plot: When a Roman General is betrayed, and his family murdered by an emperor's corrupt son, he comes to Rome as a gladiator to seek revenge.

160.movie_plot: On a U.S. nuclear missile sub, a young First Officer stages a mutiny, to prevent his trigger happy Captain from launching his missiles, before confirming his orders to do so.

259.movie_plot: An extremely volatile and dangerous Englishman goes to Los Angeles to find the man he considers responsible for his daughter's death.

235.movie_plot: A comedy about a psychiatrist whose number one patient is an insecure mob boss.

114.movie_plot: Humberto Fuentes is a wealthy doctor whose wife has recently died. In spite of the advice of his children, he takes a trip to visit his former students who now work in impoverished villages...

212.movie_plot: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

197.movie_plot: A babysitter must battle her way through the big city after being stranded there with the kids she's looking after.

222.movie_plot: A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis when they assassinate his father and free their desert world from the emperor's rule.

149.movie_plot: An old man makes a long journey by lawnmower to mend his relationship with an ill brother.

154.movie_plot: A film of the early years of the reign of Elizabeth I of England and her difficult task of learning what is necessary to be a monarch.

262.movie_plot: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

250.movie_plot: When three blue collar acquaintances come across millions of dollars in lost cash they make a plan to keep their find from the authorities but find complications and mistrust weaving its way into their plan.

61.movie_plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

145.movie_plot: Loretta Castorini, a bookkeeper from Brooklyn, New York, finds herself in a difficult situation when she falls for the brother of the man she has agreed to marry.

177.movie_plot: The life histories of four Asian women and their daughters reflect and guide each other.

66.movie_plot: A disillusioned college graduate finds himself torn between his older lover and her daughter.

72.movie_plot: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.

56.movie_plot: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt lead by a seasoned US Marshall.

132.movie_name: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me (1999)
132.movie_plot: Dr. Evil is back and has invented a new time machine that allows him to go back to the 1960s and steal Austin Powers' mojo, inadvertently leaving him "shagless".

6.movie_plot: A high school wise guy is determined to have a day off from school, despite what the Principal thinks of that.

43.movie_plot: The incredible story of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, told by his peer and secret rival Antonio Salieri - now confined to an insane asylum.

201.movie_plot: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

208.movie_plot: Following the death of a publishing tycoon, news reporters scramble to discover the meaning of his final utterance.

106.movie_plot: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

96.movie_plot: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

221.movie_plot: A female Senator succeeds in enrolling a woman into Combined Reconnaissance Team training where everyone expects her to fail.

170.movie_plot: A game designer on the run from assassins must play her latest virtual reality creation with a marketing trainee to determine if the game has been damaged.

110.movie_plot: A group of inept amateur superheroes must try to save the day when a supervillian threatens to destroy a major superhero and the city.

39.movie_plot: An employee of a corporation with a lucrative secret process is tempted to betray it. But there's more to it than that.

176.movie_plot: The story of a young man's adventures in the Californian pornography industry of the late 1970s and early 1980s.

209.movie_plot: Humanity finds a mysterious, obviously artificial object buried beneath the Lunar surface and, with the intelligent computer H.A.L. 9000, sets off on a quest.

135.movie_plot: Young lovers Hero and Claudio, soon to wed, conspire to get verbal sparring partners and confirmed singles Benedick and Beatrice to wed as well.

1.movie_plot: Robert Ford, who's idolized Jesse James since childhood, tries hard to join the reforming gang of the Missouri outlaw, but gradually becomes resentful of the bandit leader.

210.movie_plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

24.movie_plot: An up-and-coming pool player plays a long-time champion in a single high-stakes match.

184.movie_plot: When a cockerel apparently flies into a chicken farm, the chickens see him as an opportunity to escape their evil owners.

278.movie_plot: The life of a simple bookshop owner changes when he meets the most famous film star in the world.

233.movie_plot: The adventures of high school and junior high students on the last day of school in May 1976.

257.movie_plot: Two girls have an intense fantasy life; their parents, concerned the fantasy is too intense, separate them, and the girls take revenge.

93.movie_plot: An exploration of how completely different the television series is from the film. The cast and filmmakers underwent quite a change in order to create the film X Files, The (1998). We are ...

127.movie_plot: After a simple jewelry heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

95.movie_plot: When the skeleton of his murdered predecessor is found, Sheriff Sam Deeds unearths many other long-buried secrets in his Texas border town.

289.movie_plot: A beautiful but naïve aspiring television personality films a documentary on teenagers with a darker ulterior motive.

21.movie_plot: Federal Agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop Al Capone; because of rampant corruption, he assembles a small, hand-picked team.

108.movie_plot: A gentle man, with scissors for hands, is brought into a new community after living in isolation.

124.movie_plot: In the aftermath of the Persian Gulf War, four soldiers set out to steal gold that was stolen from Kuwait, but they discover people who desperately need their help.

146.movie_plot: A man in a legal but hurtful business needs an escort for some social events, and hires a beautiful prostitute he meets... only to fall in love.

54.movie_plot: A man obsessed with conspiracy theories becomes a target after one of his theories turns out to be true. Unfortunately, in order to save himself, he has to figure out which theory it is.

281.movie_plot: A group of Southern California high school students are enjoying their most important subjects: sex, drugs and rock n' roll.

242.movie_plot: A reporter is assigned to write a story about a woman who has left a string of fiances at the altar.

71.movie_plot: In London, four very different people team up to commit armed robbery, then try to doublecross each other for the loot.

240.movie_plot: After the son of engineer Bill Markham is abducted by an aboriginal tribe on the edge of the rain forest, the engineer spends the next 10 years searching for him.

116.movie_name: Hand That Rocks the Cradle, The (1992)
116.movie_plot: After her humiliated husband kills himself, an embittered pregnant widow loses her child, and embarks on a mission of vengeance against a woman and her family.

188.movie_plot: Two slacker friends try to promote their public-access cable show.

166.movie_plot: A young man's mother is bitten by a Sumatran rat-monkey. She gets sick and dies, at which time she comes back to life, killing and eating dogs, nurses, friends, and neighbors.

272.movie_plot: The remake of the 1970 Neil Simon comedy follows the adventures of a couple, Henry and Nancy Clark, vexed by misfortune while in New York City for a job interview.
